website_summaries.verdict: Innovative, smart razor that detects beard design and provides a proper trim and close shave.
pros: With 5 blades fueled by a powerful motor, this high-end razor tackles the toughest beards for a precise shave
Comfortable razor follows contours of the face
Works on wet or dry skin
cons: May not be necessary for thinner beards

customer_reviews.title: The best electric shaver out there
customer_reviews.text: Currently a Braun Series 9 user - which is a great shaver. The LV95 from Panasonic is another level. Super close shave, less passes required when compared to the Braun and no skin irritation around the neck area. This is now my primary shaver, sorry Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Hoolio

customer_reviews.title: This is simply the best electric shaver I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best electric shaver I have ever owned. I have for the past 40 years ben a Philips fan, but after very disapointing results with the Philips Series 9000 (and so awkward to use the cleaning system it defies belief!) that I took a chance with the Panasonic. So glad I did, it gives a very close and comfortable shave. The cleaning system is also very easy to use. After using for a month, I would highly recommend this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D S

customer_reviews.title: A superb quality shaver that achieves great results quickly and without skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: My father is meticulously well groomed at all times and takes great pride in shaving so that he doesn’t have a hair out of place. He used to be a fan of Braun shavers but doesn’t like the current integrated blade mechanism within the foil. Having meticulously researched the topic, he came to the conclusion that Panasonic now make the best shavers. I therefore bought him this shaver as an 80th birthday present. He is delighted with it. No razor burn, no irritation at all whilst shaving and he was able to achieve a perfect result far quicker than his older Panasonic model.
customer_reviews.author: P. Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Just get this over the other brands  without a second thought and you will have the closest shave
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't decide which to go for between the Braun Series 7 7855s & the Panasonic Arc 5 after doing my research as the Braun 7 (new) was selling for £86 on ebay and the Arc 5 on amazon for £119. Got the Panasonic Arc 5 and was shocked how close the shave was with foam , it was even better than the razor blade shave which i most often use. Its amazing how good this shaver is even when using under my chin and neck area, it was almost impossible to shave with my previous Braun series 3 under the neck/chin but this Arc 5 makes it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay kuchu

customer_reviews.title: I have quite bad scalp and facial psoriases
customer_reviews.text: So Im one day into this. I have quite bad scalp and facial psoriases. This has made shaving easy and painless. It cuts super close without ever aggravating my skin. Ive tried many others in the past and they cut me. If you just want to be a sly bald guy or make your stubble disappear this will do it without issue. Remember. Like all foil shavers it takes multiple passes. I find it quite soothing and relaxing to spend time doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: At last, an Electric Shaver that shaves as close or closer than a wet shave.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been brainwashed into thinking that the big three brands would give me what I wanted: a close shave but was always disappointed. So I thought what the hell and went for this one. Well this was the best choice I have ever made for a Electric Shaver. The good points 5 Blades (which has given the best result ever) very quiet (It sounds like a bubble bee) Interesting settings Well made. Nice cleaning station. Bad points: None
customer_reviews.author: Martin D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver with a couple of minor niggles.
customer_reviews.text: Having always had rotary electric shavers, this is my first foil shaver and, so far, I have not been disappointed. It's very smooth on the skin and reasonably quiet. With my old shaver, I had reached the point (AKA old age!) where I could only shave every couple of days as my skin became sore. No such problem with this shaver. Daily shaves and no discomfort. Just two niggles. Cleaning with the brush, it can be awkward to get between the blades and you end up shaving the cleaning brush! Also, the battery doesn't seem to last as long as my old shaver even though shaving with this is much faster. Otherwise very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: mike moreton

customer_reviews.title: It will never beat a wet shave
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used an electric razor for 30 years.. they were always rubbish when compared to a simple wet shave with a good blade. Now I'm in a position to spend some serious money to see if technology has improved.. and believe me.. two hundred quid is serious money. Technology has NOT improved.. It's pretty rubbish at shaving.. it simply does not achieve anything like the same result as a wet shave. I can't be bothered to send it back and I'll keep it for emergencies or maybe Sundays when I don't need the best shave.. Sometimes the simple things are still best folks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris4614

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this shaver
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers I had used Philips for many years( I have their Arcitech model) but found recent blade head replacements very unsatisfactory, orange blade holders keet falling out during cleaning, did not cut as close as my original head etc.etc I amd very pleased with this Panasonic, After a week or so your beard seems to get used to the new shaver and I now find I am getting very close comfortable shaves every day, initially the shaver seems a little bulky but I quickly found it very easy to use.I have a goatee type beatdand the trimmer is excellent for shaving around it etc. Its eady to clean and the battery ladts me 2 weeks confortably.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton.D

customer_reviews.title: The earlier model is a more comfortable shave and whilst still working the trimmer has broken ...
customer_reviews.text: after 73 days the trimmer slide detached. The shaver is close to the skin perhaps a bit too close and is retrograde design to the previous model I have which is also the 5 blade Panasonic. The earlier model is a more comfortable shave and whilst still working the trimmer has broken too..... I can only praise Amazon for providing a refund - 5/5 customer service...
customer_reviews.author: Ag

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Can an electric shaver ever be as good as a wet shave with a razor? No it cannot, simply due to the fact that there will always be a metal foil or similar between the blade and the skin. However, this shaver by far gives the best shave I have ever had from an electric one I use it dry, I have not used it wet with shaving foam/gel yet because if I put foam/gel on my face I may as well use a razor! Either way, if you prefer to use an electric shaver I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not as exceptional shaver as you'd expect from the price.
customer_reviews.text: Shaving with this causes almost zero irritation. I used to have a lot of problems with in-grown hair, and I didn't have any since I started using this. The battery charge lasts really long, the LCD screen is useful. The shaver's very easy to clean. Using it feels comfortable on the skin. But otherwise, it's loud, bulky, handles flat lying hairs much worse than any shavers I've tried before. I usually need the use a cartridge razor to clean up what this couldn't - because the shaving performance of this for my facial hair is just so bad. Not quite what I expected for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamas Csala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent close shave for the head
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shaver. I use this shaver to shave my head, I had a pitbull platinum but had nothing but problems with the motor stopping and blades coming apart and impossible to fit back together. After reading a few Internet reviews I decided to give this a try. I was initially skeptical about a foil razor being used on my head, expecting razor burn or an uneven shave. I couldn't be more wrong. The shave is nice and close, the shaver feels powerful and left my hair nice and short and no razor burn. I'd highly recommend for anyone disillusioned with the pitbull.
customer_reviews.author: billydavey

customer_reviews.title: Quality shaver that delivers a close shave.
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using a normal razor due to shaving rash and was advised by my doctor to switch to an electric razor. Being used to a close shave leaving my skin smooth, I feared disappointment but this shaver really delivers a close shave. My rash has gone and I am now an electric razor convert. The shaver itself is well made and sturdy and has a quality feel about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. A. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Closer shave than a blade
customer_reviews.text: I had my Phillips for years , but increasingly had to do wet shave as just was not working well. This new shaver is the best I have ever had. Cuts very close and also cuts longer hairs without needing a blade. Easy to clean, long battery life. Brilliant. Now 3 months one and I remain totally impressed. Key is the easy cleaning, off with the head, wash under tap, and leave to dry. Easy, quick. By comparison the phillips never got cleaned daily. Best shaver ever had and such a close shave better than the top wet shave!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Forget wet shaving, use this as a dry shaver and save time!
customer_reviews.text: Utterly brilliant shaver. I'll never bother to wet shave again now I have this little wonder. I'm done in a couple of minutes just daily dry shaving. The end result is close enough for me. No rash, it's so kind on the skin, just a little light moisturier post shave, every shave. Keeping the shaver head and foils clean is a doddle with the included brush
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver of the many I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have, over many years, owned most makes of electric shaver. This includes rotary head and ones like this Panasonic. This shaver is the most expensive I have owned but is by far the best. It feels solid and built to last. The charge and clean machine works well but takes a long time and is quite noisy. I only use it every 2-3 days for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Enniomorry

customer_reviews.title: Close comfortable shave but the cutter only lasts 6 months or so and replacements are expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of electric shavers and this one gives the best, most comfortable, closest shave. The cutter oscillates at a much higher frequency than other foil shavers, and I guess this is one of the reasons why it's so good, but the downside is that the cutters do get blunt and they're quite expensive to replace, and I've needed them roughly every six months. I don't think it's any worse than any other electric razor, but because the product is so good when they're new, you tend to want to replace them when they become a bit dull.
customer_reviews.author: Ms B.

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver we have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is fantastic! Me and my partner both have undercuts so like to keep them shaven without having to go to the barbers every few days! This takes of every single hair so quickly! Literally move it over your head once and it’s done! It’s insane! The only thing is don’t get to close to the edge with the 3rd blade as that will remove long hair. But I would recommend this 100% wish we bought it ages ago! We had a very cheap one and you would keep having to go over the same patch for it to remove the hair & it would take so long! But this takes 5 mins and you are sorted!
customer_reviews.author: Baby David

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning shaver! I have very sensitive skin so I can't wet shave without major irritation. This shaver is so gentle and smooth I can't even feel it. I sent back 2 braun series 7's that were cutting my face and decided to try a Panasonic as me last shaver was Panasonic and was very good. I will always buy Panasonic from now on. Thank you for a blissful shaving experience :)
customer_reviews.author: Jac Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Forget about BRAUN !!!
customer_reviews.text: Having used Braun Series 3 for about 4 years I finally decided to buy something different and more expensive than my first electric shaver. After using it 3 or 4 times I am amazed with the results and sad I was slaughtering my face with Braun for so many years. I only regret that I haven't bought it earlier. It's more accurate and efficient, doesn't pull my hair out, it is pleasure to be using it. Shaving takes less time with better results. Not cheap, but I don't regret spending the amount. It works for me :D
customer_reviews.author: AzerMan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this almost 2 years - I like to try things out! This is the BEST electric shaver I've ever had, I'd say it shaves to about 85% equivalent to a wet shave - which is high. I've primarily been a wet shaver before. I did a lot of research before buying his and I'm totally satisfied with it. Battery life is excellent - The cleaning solution I think is over priced but that's really the only downside
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bond

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for a few weeks now and did some thorough research before purchasing including the reviews on Amazon. This is the closest shave you will get compared to a normal mach 3 or similar. This piece of kit is simply outstanding. I have another Panasonic shaver currently which while being good is nowhere close to the performance of this. My advice would be to purchase. Don't even think about it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver still not good as a razor
customer_reviews.text: I think I shaved everything in my life. Blades, Gillette, Bic, Wilkinson, Philips, One Blade, Braun series 3. Now I bought the best one from Panasonic. I must admit that this device is able to shave like a razor on my cheeks. The only problem is with the neck, and that is a problem for every shaver, whether it is Braun 9 or the best Philips. Don't misunderstand me, this equipment is good and I use it regularly, but I always have to use the standard Gillette for small improvements. Great battery life. Very easy to clean. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub

customer_reviews.title: Closest shave ever!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shaver at a very good price - just under £100. Must admit I wouldn't have considered at the full price of around £240! Bought to replace a Braun Series 3 which I've never been happy with. So much so that I also have a cheap rotary shaver to shave the bits the Braun doesn't get. This one with its 5 blades is a huge improvement. The floating head adjusts well to your contours or you can have it fixed to do some finishing off. It's much quieter than the Braun too. Delighted with purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought Braun shavers in the past believing they were the best but not being completely satisfied with them. Last one I bought was a Series 9 for over £300. The second replacement foil broke so I decided to make a change. I bought this Panasonic for £124 and what a change for the better it is. Besides being about a third of the price, this shaver is giving me a much closer and less irritating shave than I have ever had. It proves to me that the Germans are brilliant at their marketing for everything like cars and electronics but pretty rubbish at the actual product quality against other brands on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pullen

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver! Very close shave!
customer_reviews.text: It is simply awesome! I've switched over from Braun Series 7 and this one is superior! The only thing to point out is that it performs best with regular shave (at least for me) as it struggles to cut the facial hair efficiently when you let it grow a little. So just make sure you shave regularly and you will not be disappointed. Well done Panasonic! Sideburns trimmer gives closer shave than my last one by Braun but the latter was positioned a little better so you could give a more precise cut (shape) to your sideburns. But even with that i am very happy with this shaver and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Beware dry shave on sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Had two previous middle priced Panasonic shavers and after lots of research decided to go upmarket. My aims were a good dry shave on sensitive skin, which unfortunately this item does not satisfy. My skin feels tight and irritated after about a 4.5 minute dry shave and to be honest it takes at least a couple of pass overs in the same area to feel close to smooth. Disappointed to say the least.....
customer_reviews.author: maborouk

customer_reviews.title: What everyone says is true.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Philips shavers (for the past 45 years). My most recent was the PT920 Philips shaver. I worked pretty well when new but now worn out and not cutting that close any more. I decided to get new and was trying to choose between the Panasonic ES-LV95 and the Philips S9041/12. I read the reports here and opted for the Panasonic. I have no regrets. It's the closest electric shave I have ever had. The only slight drawback is, as someone here said, it sounds like a swarm of bees. I'm a convert! I wonder what the newest Philips is like.....
customer_reviews.author: Fitpaul

customer_reviews.title: cleaning station broke 2 days after 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: started well, shave not to bad , have previously for 25-30 years used braun but the last 3 have literally fallen apart, so gave Panasonic a try. year and 2 days after purchase noticed that the fluid is now not being pumped in to clean, great ,another lemon. *** UPDATE** well the second one I purchased the cleaning station died 2 months after the warranty. there appears to be a design flaw in the cleaning stations.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony porter

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s a good shave
customer_reviews.text: Bought in the black Friday deal so was a great price even though the price Amazon said I wasn’t really that accurate as I only really saved £30.00 from the today’s market price was, however the shaver gives a very good shave for its price,and charging wise was fast.....it’s a great razor for its price and see no benefits to paying the higher price for the next model up
customer_reviews.author: Cpt Big Pete

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and quick
customer_reviews.text: I have an LL21 (Panasonic 3 blade) and this LV67 is a whole class above. To get a close shave with the three blade you really need to wet shave but my first shave with this shaver, dry, was excellent. It's quiet and quick. The pop up trimmer edges my sideburns and the little trimmer attachment from the LL21 trims my eyebrows very neatly. It's nicely made and in flexible mode the shaving head seems to catch everything. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: shaver does not give a clean shave
customer_reviews.text: I did substantial online research before purchasing this item and was totally shocked after using it to see how many hair follicles were left unshaven on my face and neck after an extensive shave. Tried both wet and dry shaves, both with and without shaving cream. Unfortunately to me a clean shave is just that and this razor did not provide me with a clean shave at all. I must add that I do not have a thick beard and am a regular shaver. I am in the process of getting a refund from Amazon and appreciate the excellent service received.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Angel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is brilliant, gives the closest shave ever with no drag. It's quick and leaves no rash. After decades of using opposition shavers this one is fabulous and half the price of other premium products. The big head shaves large areas efficiently and fast and makes shaving as much of a pleasure as it can possibly be. I've now used it for over a month without shaving problems. The cleaning process is also super-efficient and costs much less than opposition systems. I hope it last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I’ve ever used and owned. So good I sold my braun 9. I also review it in my YouTube channel experiment54 I use it everyday on my face and twice maybe a week on my head. The foil has lasted over a year. Brilliant engineering! Kudos to the engineers and designers!!! If it broke I’d buy another without question.
customer_reviews.author: experiment54

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaver
customer_reviews.text: It is my sixty shaver. I used before three Philips, One Braun and another Panasonic. This is absolutely the best. Very good shaving quality close to razor performance. Only negative point is the cleaning procedure. According to manual you should clean the machine in his cleaning stand with special solution. It takes nearly two hours..... 5 minutes in shaving and two hours cleaning? Of course I am cleaning it one time a week. But manual says it must be every time after usage.
customer_reviews.author: N. Seyman

customer_reviews.title: Very close shave.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is best used for every day shaving. If you like to leave it for a couple of days in between then you may get a bit of pulling. It shaves almost as close as a Mach 3. I got 8 days use out of a full charge and was still at 20% left. If you have very wiry hair then I would suggest looking at a Braun but this is brilliant and would be your best option if you don't. I can wholeheartedly say this is a brilliant shaver.
customer_reviews.author: RES EV1L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cordless shaver
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the older version (ES-RF41) and this new model is even better. The higher speed and bigger 5 blade head shaves closer and better. Very happy so far. Easy to clean under the tap, glad I did not go for the more expensive self-cleaning model.
customer_reviews.author: Russ64

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs to be used everyday. Case is useless and no brush included.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shaver itself is fine but not good for longer hairs laying flat. Best if you shave everyday. No brush was included in the box but I wash the shaver under the tap anyway. Travel case can only fit the shaver and is too soft to offer any protection, I'll use it to store other things whilst travelling and buy a co2CREA hard travel case which can accommodate the charger and shaver.
customer_reviews.author: PF59

customer_reviews.title: Superb shaver that really does shave as close as a blade.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this shaver. It gives a really close shave without the soreness that other shavers leave. Battery lasts for half a dozen shaves and recharge is rapid. It’s also easy to clean under the tap. Thanks to a Which recommendation, I have the shaver I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stortford Rugby

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've just changed from a Philishave to Panasonic. I've used this razor for about 10 days now. Really fantastic smooth, and quick, shave. A step change from other razors I've owned. It also felt very smooth as it cuts so, for me, it causes less skin irritation. (The version that shipped to me was black rather than the purple shown in the picture. I prefer the black although haven't actually seen the purple one).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for fine facial hair
customer_reviews.text: A friend highly recommend this to me, plus great reviews on here. But unfortunately it just didn’t work for me. Cut my face, patchy results and left a rash. (That was a wet shave too) All the things I thought a top rated electric shaver would avoid. It’s probably a good product, just doesn’t suit my finer less course facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jamestil6569

customer_reviews.title: A close gentle shave
customer_reviews.text: Best razor I've had for a while. Has over taken Braun which I used to sear by. The shave is so gentle you hardly realise it's happening. Easy to clean though one hardly needs to added cleaner element which is way over the top. Battery life so far excellent, lasted a week or so before needing a re-charge
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shaver, really is. Top quality product from Panasonic. I upgraded from a Braun Series 5 which is the next price level down and this is a world apart. I have very sensitive skin and because this thing is good at what it does I have very minor redness at bottom of neck but otherwise nothing! Far better than with the Braun and 10x better than wet shaving with a manual. Fab shaver, super happy!
customer_reviews.author: ed85

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shave at a Wow price!
customer_reviews.text: My 80+ year old father in law previously upset Braun user gives his feedback and he's at best difficult to please says after 1 initial use...it's his best ever shave...well done Panasonic it took me hours to dissect X check reviews from Braun Philips Panasonic etc. I'm so glad I chose this make and model. Thanks Amazon great price!
customer_reviews.author: SSBB

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this shaver
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this shaver! This shaves just as close as using a wet blade shaver, in the neck area and under the jawline this shaves even better than a wet blade. I used it dry and gave no skin irritation at all! I’m glad I chose the best and it is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Arent Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave
customer_reviews.text: Best shave I've had from an electric razor. I would like a stand to be included, even if you don't buy the full cleaning kit. A bit of moulded plastic surely wouldn't cost that much. Still, it's a minor issue for an otherwise brilliant bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is the best that I've ever used and I'm very happy with it in every way. I bought it with the cleaner and the jury is out on that. I have only used it once and it works fine, but I think that mostly I'll just use conventional manual cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as a blade
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used an electric shaver in 20 years because of my thick stubble. Pleased to say things have massively improved in that time. This gives a really good, close shave - wet or dry. Good to hold. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CraigJB

customer_reviews.title: It is always a matter of what suits you best, but this shaver suits me very well and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is always a matter of what suits you best, but this shaver suits me very well and is one of the best I have used (I have had Braun Series 7 & and a Phillips) It is my second Panasonic and gentler than my last one. The battery has good life and the trimmer is very effective at capturing the odd hair that has gone against the grain.
customer_reviews.author: Dell258f

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: After one week of daily use (dry), I came to the conclusion that this is a masterpiece of electric shaver. Light weight and easy to handle, noise is at a very acceptable level and, most important, the shave is as close as with the usual razor, without the in inherent irritation. So far, just a quick wash under the water tap was enough to clean it. At the discounted price, it is a good value for money buy.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Quality wet or dry shaver
customer_reviews.text: A quality product to use wet or dry. If using wet then only use shaving foam as this washes out better. Lasts a long time between charges. Comfortable on skin although it will not be as good as an ordinary razor shave.
customer_reviews.author: Brain

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a close shave
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this I use to a razor and became fed up of always cutting myself. Seeing as this was top of the ‘best shavers for 2019’, and on a deal, I bought it. It’s is a nice shaver. However is it not ergonomic. It is really difficult to get the kid of close shave I have become accustomed too. Six months on, I’m still persevering but I do slightly regret the choice I made.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great. I normally hate shaving as I have quick thick growth and it's always a painful experience no matter what steps are taken (steaming, oil, etc) This one gets a really close, painless shave and is very easy to use, charge etc. The only mistake was in buying the self-cleaning kit: there's really no need. It's so easy to open the shaver each morning, blow out the hair 'dust' after each shave! Or rinse it all under the tap.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McGough

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to shave my head after using a 3x blade for many many years but WOW this 5x blade does the job in half the time and it cuts closer, don't think about the price so treat yrself and yr head or face lol
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul Kennedy Cse Bvh

customer_reviews.title: The business
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the battery charged very quickly. I had let my beard grow for a few days before receipt and the shaver whipped it off with no effort leaving a smooth skin. A fine quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected from Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Panasonic shavers (the Japanese models) for years. I was in London recently and found out that I hadn't brought my shaver; so decided to buy this "International" model. As it turned out, it is lighter and practical. There is no way for me to verify whether this model is more powerful than the Japanese one, but it seems to me more powerful. Perhaps a Panasonic representative can confirm this!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dee

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought it twice, despite only lasting 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I shave in the shower with none foaming shaving gel. I get a much better shaved than if I use a match 3 etc. My first shaving dead after 2.5 years. My new one seems to have a much better battery life. Tip, do not let it run completely flat as that is what I think ruined my old one.
customer_reviews.author: D Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic es-lv65-a electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: Best ever shaver I have bought it's as close as a normal blade razer. 10 out of ten would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best shaver I have ever owned; very smooth and gentle on my face (neck in particular). Had it for 12 months and it's been excellent. I have usually used straight bladed electric shavers rather than Philishave style ones although I did try one of those but didn't get on with it. Not needed to replace the head yet. Cleaning dock works very well and is easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Dymond

customer_reviews.title: Great shave on any beard
customer_reviews.text: I take the top cover off to clean the blades but three of the blades stay in the mesh top,don’t know how to get them out without breaking something, so all I can clean are the other two blades, please help me with this problem
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very amazing shave 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Received but not tried yet as I've been on holiday. Quite an amazing shave, without any effort. I also have the 3 years cover, and I just in case it goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: KA$H

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good unit from what other users says
customer_reviews.text: First time I've had an electric razor for at least 40 years I anticipate a stay in hospital in the new year so I need to get used to it. So I can't tell what it's like til then.the item is much bigger than my last one So only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Bkbanner

customer_reviews.title: Good shave and charging/cleaning station is a nice addition
customer_reviews.text: A top quality shaver that gives a good shave and the cleaning station is a nice addition too that doubles up as your charger. It prompts you as to when to activate the cleaning process and you can just use it as the charging dock only in between those times. I’m happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jampot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Really is the best shaver I’ve had.
customer_reviews.text: Had all the big name, very expensive shavers in the past. Braun, Phillips etc. I can honestly say, this is the only one they has delivered for me. Very close shave and quick too. Was sceptical to start with but am a convert now. Best shaver I’ve owned in 35 years. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Shaves close but does not cut all hairs
customer_reviews.text: Had Braun series 7 before this which overall shaved better this shaves closer but misses a lot of hairs repeated passes with shaver will still not cut them but leaves face sore. After shaving left with hairs on neck.
customer_reviews.author: Someday

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected after reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Really good shaver. Definitely should be used wet with soap to get a closer shave. I managed to get 15 shaves before it needed a recharge. But I shave very slowly and closely. You can shave dry, but for me, it didn't shave as close wet. Not used the cleaning station yet but otherwise it's exactly what I expected for a highly rated not inexpensive electric razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality shaver
customer_reviews.text: The best you can get really close very good for people with thick beard growth like mine but the trimmers useless so i dont think il be using that comparing this to philips new models which are really poor compared to how they used to be i give panasonic the future of shaving i will edit this review but so far sooo good
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Y. Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Superb shave
customer_reviews.text: This is closer than a wet shave with no razor burn - fantastic shaver
customer_reviews.author: dog FM

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: had top range braun Phillips remington but this beats them all in all areas - a real gem of a shaver and I use as a wet shaver with king of shaves oil
customer_reviews.author: Al 🙄

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shave I have had.
customer_reviews.text: It really shaves smooth, its quick and easy to use and charge. its not that easy to clean (the heads are so complex) but for the best electric shave you will get you just cannot beat this.
customer_reviews.author: TAC45

customer_reviews.title: Excellence for the shave
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I've ever bought only had 3 shaves with it but blows my old braun outta the water still saying 100% battery too much closer on the, shave also wife's well impressed says its like a babies bum
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews suggest
customer_reviews.text: I opted for this product over the Braun series 9 after doing some research online. The price and great reviews led me to purchase this item. Sadly however, this product isn't as good as the reviews suggest. I struggle to get clean shave around my neck area, leaving me with patches of hair. Fortunately, there is a clipper on this device which i use to remove the strands of neck hair, but this leads to irritation due to my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: New to electric shaving, this shaves as about as close as a manual razor. Does take a bit of time to get used to it ie best way to hold and direction. Cleaning station is great.
customer_reviews.author: James Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic  ES-LV95-s Wet and Dry Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Xmas Present, not yet opend the box yet, and obviously not used, so no comment about the shaver as yet, very dificult which one to chose, but after reading revues on line I decided to go for the Panasonic as opposed the Braun S9, both of which are very close to each other, hard decision to make, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: steven paul howarth

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: After 45 years of wet shaving I am glad I took the plunge and bought this razor. With a little time and care you can get as close to a really good wet shave as makes no difference with this razor. Quick charge time (under an hour) and so easy to clean, no hesitation in recommending this razor to any one who doubts the ability of modern electric razors.
customer_reviews.author: Ambient Fish

customer_reviews.title: As good as, if not better than, a wet shave.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how close this shaver shaves! I keep stroking my face in wonderment. I've tried many brands of razor and always reverted back to wet shaving and just used an electric shaver to finish off bits that I might have missed. This shaver is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: BournemouthBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: Really good shaver, had it for a few months and managed to get closer shave when used with a shaving gel or foam than dry and have that smooth face! Not much razor burn for a very close shave compared to a manual razor So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best ever shaver of all time on a par with wet shaving best ever, easy to clean, battery seams to last for a long time, been 9 days without charge, MAGIC!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using an 8 years old Panasonic shaver so it was a big step up. The ES-LV95 works like a charm, clean smooth shave of 4-5 days old of facial hair. I'm very happy with this shaver, would buy it again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very good shave and battery life
customer_reviews.text: It is a well constructed shaver but unfortunately the on/off switch is just where you would place your thumb when holding it, I keep switching it off accidentally. could do with a lock or moving the on/off switch so it can't be accidentally switched off during the shave.
customer_reviews.author: Beanpole

customer_reviews.title: Probably not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Started off fantastic but after a couple of months the motor started slowing on the slightest pressure and has a weird vibration to it. Replaced the foils (not cheap!) but no difference. Return window closed and no way to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten-louise brown

customer_reviews.title: Like it.  Update. Having second thoughts.
customer_reviews.text: Early days, but it does a good job. Update. The shaver has ceased working after just over a year and I am having trouble trying to contact Amazon about it. The battery life is supposed to be three years so I would expect there to be a claim here. AMAZON if you read this, then please contact me and help me with the way forward.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver there is
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best one ive had. Ive had the 5 and 9 series from braun but this is in a different league. Close as a blade this one. Outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: My friend is very pleased with is New Blade shaver Wet and Dry , he definitely recommend the shaver , Excellent service, Great seller,
customer_reviews.author: DabsieMowsieCyd48

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic the way forward in wet shaving
customer_reviews.text: Just started using following the recent failure of my latest Braun. What a delight to use, despite the five blades it is so light and easy to hold. The shaving results I am now achieving are the best I have ever managed from an electric shaver. I have decided to use it as wet razor using foam, what a result and is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues with the foil
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this late December 2019 and have been using it for 6 months. However, the foil developed a jagged hole and now cutting my skin. I always looked after the saver well, never dropped, always cleaned it well with its original cleaning stand and liquid. I would expect better quality for this price
customer_reviews.author: Bilsel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller and great product
customer_reviews.text: This Panasonic Shaver is amazing, this is the first time ever for me to use a blade shaver on my head and it took around 15 minutes including a couple of cleanings to the foils using the brush. The result was beyond my expectations, it shaved my head just like a razor. Also the product was delivered on time, certainly I will buy again from the same seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pick up thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: Awful thing! I bought this to replace my old Panasonic ES8163 as replacements were getting expensive , you could cut a hedge with that thing! My facial hair is like wire and grows in all directions and with this razor I find myself trying to push individual hairs into the foil to cut as it doesn’t pick them up. I now see replacements for it are more expensive than my old razor, which fortunately I kept, so I’m going back to that!
customer_reviews.author: david robertshaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shaver
customer_reviews.text: The person who was given this shaver is extremely pleased with it and no problems have been found using it.
customer_reviews.author: SmudgE

customer_reviews.title: Great close shave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself as a replacement for a Braun series 3. Feels different in the hand and much lighter than I expected, but gives a great close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Pick-a-Win

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for my brother, it looks very well packaged and he seems happy with the results so a all in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: chazlondon

customer_reviews.title: It does not give quite as close a shave as a wet shave with the best and most expensive razors does -- but for me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a significant step up on any electric shaver I have owned. It does not give quite as close a shave as a wet shave with the best and most expensive razors does -- but for me at least the latter would result in razor rash. The cleaner is very effective and hassle free, though the cleaning fluid is on the expensive side, particularly as it has to be replaced about every month.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley Patterns

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: This is the best razer I've ever used shaves you like a blade cant find fault on anything used to buy three headed ones not any more
customer_reviews.author: james cushnaghan

customer_reviews.title: Superb shaver
customer_reviews.text: A joy to use , very close shave , good to handle and a lot quieter than earlier models.
customer_reviews.author: A. HAWKINS

customer_reviews.title: fit for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable close shave, haven't uused them with a wet shave but good used dry,
customer_reviews.author: lw

customer_reviews.title: My best shaver by far?
customer_reviews.text: I'm well pleased with my purchase, gives a great shave and is fast too charge, and I can use it in my shower!!! Great stuff?
customer_reviews.author: eric shurmer

customer_reviews.title: Really does shave as close as a blade
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as a blade, even in dry mode. Only concern is how long the rechargeable battery will last - manual says 3 years if charged once every 2 weeks but I seem to need to charge it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: MWD88

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As an expensive shaver, it does not deliver. By 5.00 p.m. I could do with another shave. It does not get close to a good shave.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Heavy hair growth no problem. Covers angles and close areas perfectly. really easy to use, to charge and to clean. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R Hemsley

product_meta.title: Panasonic ES-LV65-S811 Wet & Dry Shaver
product_meta.description:

Pop-Up Trimmer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
